alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:58PM CDT until May 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. .The Goose River will continue to oscillate around 12.50 feet over the next few days. Expect minor flooding to continue. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY, MAY 12... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...Until Thursday, May 12. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. The city park in Hillsboro starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Wednesday was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
